data.name: Draw Patch
data.detailed_description:
The goal remains simple in appearance, but the more you advance in the levels and the more your brain will be strained!
Will you be able to finish all levels?
data.about_the_game:
The goal remains simple in appearance, but the more you advance in the levels and the more your brain will be strained!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
